/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with modern buildings, their curved roofs adding a unique architectural element to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the varied hues of the buildings.
